addAIReply(uint256,string).details: Add AI reply to a secret (only contract owner can call - via Agent Kit)

createComment(uint256,string).details: Create a comment on a secret - direct call

createCommentMeta(uint256,string,address.details: Create a comment on a secret (gasless via relayer)

createSecret(string).details: Membuat secret baru (post publik) - direct call

getAllSecrets(uint256,uint256).details: Get all secrets (global feed) dengan pagination

returns._0: Array of secrets, sorted by newest first

getCommentCount(uint256).details: Get comment count for a secret

getLatestSecrets(uint256).details: Get latest secrets (convenience function for global feed)

params._limit: Number of latest secrets to return (max 50)

getLikeCount(uint256).details: Get like count for a secret

getMySecrets().details: Get semua secrets yang dimiliki user

getPlatformFee().details: Get platform fee percentage (for frontend display)

getSecret(uint256).details: Get secret by ID (public - semua orang bisa baca)

getSecretComments(uint256).details: Get all comments for a secret

getSecretLikes(uint256).details: Get all users who liked a secret

getSharedSecrets().details: Get semua secrets yang di-share ke user

getSharedWith(uint256).details: Get list address yang punya akses ke secret

getTotalTips(uint256).details: Get total tips for a secret

hasUserLiked(uint256,address).details: Check if user has liked a secret

tipPost(uint256).details: Tip a post owner with 2.5% fee
